column4: hey guys, im looking at getting a new PC, now im not really a newb to building, but just not uptodate ... last PC i built had a athlon 2200+ and some crappy ATI vid card..coulld someone in here help me, as im going to need to run linux on it, aswell as windows(just for Call of Duty 4)
i think i know that i should stay away from ATI.. is this true?
cod4 has platinum rating in wine btw :)
